name: Jameson Irish Whiskey
description: A smooth, versatile Irish whiskey with a hint of vanilla, nuts, and spices. Distilled three times for exceptional smoothness.

name: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey
description: A popular American whiskey with a slightly sweet flavor, rich notes of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak.

name: Glenfiddich 12 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky
description: A light and fresh single malt scotch with notes of pear, oak, and subtle spices. Matured in oak casks for 12 years.

name: Lagavulin 16 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky
description: A rich and intense scotch whisky known for its smoky peat flavor with hints of vanilla and dried fruit.

name: Maker's Mark Bourbon Whiskey
description: A classic Kentucky bourbon with a smooth, sweet flavor featuring caramel, vanilla, and a hint of oak.

name: Bushmills Black Bush
description: A premium Irish whiskey with rich, dark fruit flavors, and nutty tones, finished with a sherry cask influence.

name: Woodford Reserve Kentucky Straight Bourbon
description: A sophisticated bourbon with notes of dried fruit, vanilla, and spice, balanced by a rich, full-bodied flavor.

name: Balvenie DoubleWood 12 Year Old
description: A single malt scotch matured in two types of wood, giving it a complex flavor with notes of honey, vanilla, and dried fruit.

name: Bulleit Bourbon
description: A bold bourbon with high rye content, featuring spicy notes of pepper, vanilla, and oak for a distinct, smooth taste.

name: Laphroaig 10 Year Old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky
description: An iconic smoky Islay scotch with intense peat flavor, complemented by hints of seaweed, iodine, and sweetness.

name: Laphroaig 10 Year Old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky
description: An iconic smoky Islay scotch with intense peat flavor, complemented by hints of seaweed, iodine, and sweetness.

name: Bulleit Bourbon
description: A bold bourbon with high rye content, featuring spicy notes of pepper, vanilla, and oak for a distinct, smooth taste.
